text: <https://codepen.io/the-true-pekkarinen/full/jOxPeMW>  super important tool to visualize how many diskettes it would take to store a file
have you seen this a couple of days ago? i thought i skipped winter and it was the first of April :smile:    <https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-62749310>

Oh wow, "A Japanese government committee has discovered about 1,900 areas in which businesses are required to use storage media like floppy disks when making applications or holding data." :sweat_smile:
when making applications???  oh wow, i thought that still storing it there would be worse enought, but actually developing software for it still in 2022?
:D I thought it meant applications as in sending some application for something,
ah ok, yeah that makes more sense
this person must be an amazing interviewer to get through the process and get the job.

*Is there a demo data generator or import file for blog posts?* 
I want to test how custom filter work, when i use the limits of the hubl functions, and need round about 200-300 articles with demo data.
